item.description:
Join folks from the Common Ground High School and the New Haven Ecology Project for a fundraiser this weekend! Proceeds from the seed sales benefit both organizations.

Organic Seedling Sale

Saturday, May 19, 12:00 pm ? 4:00 pm

Many varieties of organically grown seedlings available, including heirloom and hybrid tomatoes, peppers, eggplant, kale, collards, cucumbers, herbs, and more. Planting and growing tips available. Free event. Seedlings are $1-$3.

358 Springside Avenue
New haven
203-389-4333 ext 213

Springside Avenue is in the Whalley Ave/SCSU area


There is also a tag and bake sale hosted by Common Ground High School Students

More info at http://www.nhep.com/...

Eric will be your contact for this event: 8602149361
item.name: Organic Seedling Sale May 19 12-4pm
